framework.exception

Class AbstractException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • framework.exception.AbstractException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorizationException, BrokerException, ControlInterfaceException, DatabaseException, DataContainerException, ModuleException

    public abstract class AbstractException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Basis for all other Exceptions of the System.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner
    See Also:
